name: Blight Tavern
description:
Blight tavern will be a multiplayer endless wave survival game in which players must help the tavern master keep the infected blight at bay. You will be able to play with friends via multiplayer in the near future.

Current Features:

  • Endless waves of enemies
  • Over 7 different enemy types
  • Player progression

Upcoming Features:

  • Multiplayer (Cross platform)
  • Artifacts
  • Guilds
  • Highscores
  • Plus more

Why Itch:

We want this game to be playable virtually anywhere. We are starting with Itch as it is a zero nonsense platform. It will eventually come out on

  • Steam
  • Epic Games
  • iOS
  • Android
  • Console
